porterage 运送费, porterhouse 啤酒店, porteret 波特雷

list.abs: the 24oz . porterhouse steak was awesome . I only had a bite because it belonged to my father in-law . he surely loved it and finished it .牛排超大块.我只吃了一口.因为那是我公公的.他决对超爱那超大块牛排.因为他竟然把它吃光了。
porterage 搬运业porterhouse steak 上等腰肉牛排porterhouse 小酒店
I am hoping that he will buy a porterhouse steak some day so that I can say to him : " You will please bite it for me , Mister Nonentity .我倒希望他有朝一日买一块上等牛排，这样我就可以对他说，”请你替我咬一口，无足轻重先生。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from sense 2 of porter + house

means.word_mean: 1. large steak from the thick end of the short loin containing a T-shaped bone and large piece of tenderloin
